data.title: Isabella II of Spain
data.text:
September 29, 1833 - September 30, 1868 (35 years) (2-37) Succeeded by Amadeo I of Spain Death April 9, 1904 (73 years)

Paris, France

Father Francis I, King of the Two Sicilies (1777-1830) 5. Maria de los Milagros, Marchioness of Castillejo

Maria Theresa, Archduchess of Austria (1816-67)

Marriage May 13, 1868 - November 26, 1871 (3 years, widowed) Death January 7, 1854 (2 days) Marriage January 23, 1878 - June 26, 1878 (5 months, widowed) Second Marriage November 29, 1879 - November 25, 1885 (5 years, died) 1. María de las Mercedes, Princess of Asturias
